Articles.Content:
Some of you may renember my previus TB1.

It wasn't that good.

Now, I present to you my actual TB1 replica!

And it flies!

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/NgRvC)

**NOTES:**

**It uses FAR.**

**It WILL try to kill you when flying. Advanced piloting skills are recommended.**

STATS:

Max Speed: Mach 4 (at 20000m)

Max Altitude 25000 m.

[Download!](http://kerbalx.com/crafts/1595)

Thanks for reading!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-09T01:03:33Z" title="04/09/2015 01:03  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 9, 2015</time> by gmpd2000**

Looks very nice! +rep

I really like that show.

> 
> can it vtol horizontal???

Could't find a way without ruining the aerodynamics, so no.
Currently trying to make some nice landing gear, hopefully it won't break the shape of the aircraft.
